link_transport.h
1 /*
2  * link_protocol.h
3  *
4  * Created on: Mar 25, 2016
5  * Author: tgil
6  */
7 
8 #ifndef IFACE_LINK_TRANSPORT_H_
9 #define IFACE_LINK_TRANSPORT_H_
10 
11 #include "../mcu/types.h"
12 
13 #define LINK_MAX_TRANSFER_SIZE 64
14 #define LINK_MAX_PACKET_SIZE (63)
15 #define LINK_PACKET_HEADER_SIZE (3) //start, size and checksum
16 #define LINK_PACKET_DATA_SIZE (LINK_MAX_PACKET_SIZE - LINK_PACKET_HEADER_SIZE)
17 
18 
19 #define LINK_PACKET_STDIO_FLAG (1<<15)
20 
21 #define LINK_PACKET_START (16) //DLE character
22 #define LINK_PACKET_ACK (0x06)
23 #define LINK_PACKET_NACK (0x53)
24 
25 
26 typedef struct MCU_PACK {
27  u8 ack;
28  u8 checksum;
29 } link_ack_t;
30 
31 typedef struct MCU_PACK {
32  u8 start;
33  u8 size;
34  u8 data[LINK_PACKET_DATA_SIZE+1];
35 } link_pkt_t;
36 
37 #if defined __link
38 typedef void * link_transport_phy_t;
39 #define LINK_PHY_OPEN_ERROR ((void*)0)
40 #else
41 typedef int link_transport_phy_t;
42 #define LINK_PHY_OPEN_ERROR (-1)
43 #endif
44 
45 typedef struct {
46  link_transport_phy_t handle;
47  link_transport_phy_t (*open)(const char *, int);
48  int (*write)(link_transport_phy_t, const void*, int);
49  int (*read)(link_transport_phy_t, void*, int);
50  int (*close)(link_transport_phy_t);
51  void (*wait)(int);
52  void (*flush)(link_transport_phy_t);
53  int timeout;
54 } link_transport_driver_t;
55 
56 typedef struct {
57  int (*getname)(char * dest, const char * last, int len);
58  link_transport_phy_t (*open)(const char * name, int baudrate);
59  int (*lock)(link_transport_phy_t handle);
60  int (*unlock)(link_transport_phy_t handle);
61  int (*status)(link_transport_phy_t handle);
62  link_transport_driver_t driver;
63 } link_transport_mdriver_t;
64 
65 void link_transport_mastersettimeout(int t);
66 int link_transport_masterwrite(link_transport_mdriver_t * driver, const void * buf, int nbyte);
67 int link_transport_masterread(link_transport_mdriver_t * driver, void * buf, int nbyte);
68 
69 int link_transport_slavewrite(link_transport_driver_t * driver, const void * buf, int nbyte, int (*callback)(void*,void*,int), void * context);
70 int link_transport_slaveread(link_transport_driver_t * driver, void * buf, int nbyte, int (*callback)(void*,void*,int), void * context);
71 
72 void link_transport_insert_checksum(link_pkt_t * pkt);
73 bool link_transport_checksum_isok(link_pkt_t * pkt);
74 int link_transport_wait_packet(link_transport_driver_t * driver, link_pkt_t * pkt, int timeout);
75 int link_transport_wait_start(link_transport_driver_t * driver, link_pkt_t * pkt, int timeout);
76 
77 
78 #endif /* IFACE_LINK_TRANSPORT_H_ */
close
int close(int fildes)
open
int open(const char *name, int flags,...)
read
int read(int fildes, void *buf, size_t nbyte)
write
int write(int fildes, const void *buf, size_t nbyte)
